mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_history (learning_history_no, email, learning_time, learning_type, learning_date) VALUES ( seq_learning_history_no.NEXTVAL, #{email}, ( SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (time / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (time, 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (time, 60), 'fm00') learning_time FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2)) time FROM camstudy_member WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}) ), #{learningType}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (NVL(total,'0') / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 60), 'fm00') learning_time, learning_type, learning_date FROM (SELECT SUM ( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) TOTAL, learning_type, TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') learning_date FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{email} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'), learning_type HAVING TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE #{month}||'%')
ORDER BY learning_date

SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (NVL(total,'0') / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 60), 'fm00') time FROM (SELECT SUM ( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) TOTAL FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{value} AND TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (NVL(total,'0') / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 60), 'fm00') time FROM(SELECT AVG(total) total FROM (SELECT SUM( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) TOTAL, TO_CHAR(learning_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') day FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{value} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(learning_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) )

SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (NVL(total,'0') / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (NVL(total,'0'), 60), 'fm00') time FROM (SELECT SUM ( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) TOTAL FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{value})

SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (total / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (total, 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (total, 60), 'fm00') AS learning_time, TRUNC(total/60) AS learning_type, day AS learning_date FROM (SELECT SUM( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) TOTAL, TO_CHAR(learning_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') day FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{email} AND TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE #{month}||'%' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(learning_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT total AS learning_time, learning_type FROM (SELECT TRUNC(SUM( TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2)))/60) TOTAL, learning_type FROM learning_history WHERE email = #{email} AND TO_CHAR(learning_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE #{month}||'%' GROUP BY learning_type)
